features: Monistat Feminine Wash with Boric Acid is a fragrance-free wash that gently cleanses away feminine odor and discharge without irritation
Cool and soothing pH balanced vaginal wash adds to your feminine care routine with a gentle cleanser for a daily refresh

This feminine cleanser is pH-balanced with a unique complex with boric acid to provide a safe and gentle cleanse that matches a healthy and balanced pH (based upon the natural pH range of a woman’s external intimate area)
Tested by gynecologists, and trusted by you, Monistat feminine wash is safe and gentle enough to use every day to help cleanse odor
Contains 1 bottle of Monistat Maintain Feminine Cleanser with Boric Acid, 16 fl oz
body.description: Monistat Maintain Feminine Cleanser with Boric Acid is a fragrance-free wash that gently cleanses away feminine odor and discharge without irritating sensitive skin. This feminine wash contains a patent-pending unique boric acid complex for balanced pH-levels; it provides a safe and gentle cleanse that matches a healthy and balanced pH based upon the natural pH range of a woman's external intimate area. For when you want an extra gentle clean, Monistat’s cleanser for women helps you feel clean and refreshed. This feminine wash is perfect for after a workout, before going out, or whenever you need a soothing refresh. Non-irritating and providing a gentle cleanse, Monistat Maintain Feminine Cleanser with Boric Acid is gynecologist-tested and is safe for everyday use. Never fret about vaginal odor or discharge with this fragrance-free wash. For a fresh and clean feeling that is gentle enough for even sensitive skin and intimate areas, this feminine cleanser can be a staple in your feminine care routine. This feminine cleanser is made with purified water and comes from Monistat, the brand tested by gynecologists and trusted by you. This product is not intended to treat a vaginal yeast infection. Monistat also offers other products for feminine care such as itching and irritation, odor, chafing, and discharge, including a product range that provides symptom relief for vaginal yeast infections. Feel better faster at home with Monistat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clear, unscented, and gentle every day feminine cleanser.
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to try this product because Monistat is a trusted brand for feminine care and I do not use scented soaps, colored body washes, or general skin cleansers in my sensitive areas. I made that mistake many years ago and it did not serve me well.Monistat Boric Acid Feminine Cleanser checked all of my boxes. This cleanser is clear, unscented, gentle enough for daily use, and it’s formulated to support a healthy pH balance. Not only do I use it for daily cleansing but it also works well during menses or after intimacy.This product isn’t thick like a gel but more like the consistency of a body wash so it’s easy to dispense. Once applied, it rinses leaving no residue and it cleanses thoroughly. I haven’t experienced any irritation or adverse reactions.This product has worked well for me. It had been effective at maintaining a clean and healthy pH environment and I feel confidently fresh! I am very pleased with this product. I also like that it’s packaged in a generous sized bottle making it a great value for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was not happy with the body washes I have been using for both the body and feminine hygiene. I was happy to see Monistat was making a feminine cleanser. I trust a name brand product. I used the cleanser as directed and I am happy with the product. It may sound gross, but I purposely waited to shower 2 -3 days after I used the product. There isn't any odor and I still feel clean - a big contract than using the other washes on private parts. I looked up boric acid as I know my parents used it years ago. Boric acid is a form of a natural mineral boron that is found in seawater. Boric acid promotes vaginal balance, by maintaining your vaginal PH. I think this is better than using fragrance smelling washes on privates.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Large bottle, really lasts
reviews.reviewText: I normally buy a foam cleaner that has simpler ingredients, so in comparing Monistat Boric Acid Feminine Cleanser to that, this one is quite different. First of all, it’s a nice, thick liquid soap, so a little goes a long way. However, it has a lot of extra ingredients like Sodium Lauryl Sulfate. I also didn’t like the fact that it wasn’t sealed inside the lid.Otherwise it’s a very good value for the size and will last me for quite a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Huge bottle at 16 oz. - made by a trusted company in feminine care
reviews.reviewText: I always use a product made for feminine care when washing and cleansing this sensitive area.As women age, we tend to face dryness and often more sensitivity. This Monistat wash is pH balanced is not runny like many cleansers, but more gel like and thicker. A little amount will clean the whole area, you do not need to use a lot.I read before ordering this that it is gynecologist tested, but I expect that from a well known company known for feminine care products.Very happy with the cleansing and no irritation whatsoever.Will last a very long time. I do recommend this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love all the ingrédients but this was a bit drying for me even in the shower. I never used a feminine wash because I don’t like fragrances so I don’t have anything to compare it to. I would use my face wash which has AHAs or Dr. Bronners, undiluted. This was more drying than Dr. Bronners surprisingly. I’ll still use it but only if I’m waxed because if you have any hair longer than a few cm the wash makes them feel weird and uncomfortable from the dryness

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gengle yet effective
reviews.reviewText: The bottle is bigger than I expected, which is great because it will last a long time, even with daily use. I was surprised there wasn't a tamper resistant seal on the top of the bottle, which would have been nice for a little extra security, especially when using on a sensitive part of my body, but not a deal breaker for me. The gel is a nice consistency so it doesn't run right off your hand. It cleanses well and is very gentle, and, as stated in the listing, it has absolutely no scent. Keeps me feeling fresh longer than other feminine washes I've used so I would definitely recommend giving it a try.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cleans Lady Bits
reviews.reviewText: Love that this product isn’t just masking odor. It uses boric acid to balance the ph levels of your vajayay. It is fragrance free and dye free. I have been using this in the shower every night now for a week and I just feel a lot fresher all day. The size of the bottle is also pretty big. I was surprised how big it was when it arrived so it is a good value for the price. I would purchase this again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The Monistat Boric Acid Feminine Cleanser is a gentle and effective choice for maintaining feminine hygiene. As a fragrance-free option, it ensures a clean and refreshed feeling without any overpowering scents. The gel is easy to apply and rinse off, leaving me feeling confident and comfortable. For anyone seeking a fragrance-free, gentle, and reliable feminine wash, this Monistat cleanser is definitely worth considering.
